channel.title: About on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in About on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description:
Write your about me content here. You can include:

  • Your background and experience
  • What you do as a DataOps Engineer
  • Your interests and projects
  • How you explore the intersections of DevOps and Data

This is written in Markdown, so you can use bold, italic, links, lists, and other formatting as needed.
